product_name: e.l.f. CosmeticsHoly Hydration! Illuminating Eye Cream
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeWake up your delicate under-eye area with the skin-smoothing, rich, and nourishing e.l.f. SKIN's Holy Hydration! Illuminating Eye Cream.
details: DetailsBenefitsPreviously Illuminating Eye CreamBrightens the look of your under-eyesMinimizes dullness and dark circlesSoothes and gently hydrates your skin's most delicate areasReduces signs of aging around the eyesFormula is infused with naturally hydrating ingredientsProud to be 100% vegan and cruelty-free, worldwide. Because kindness is chic.Key IngredientsCucumber Extract - calms skin and reduces puffinessShea Butter - nourishes and softens skinGreen Tea Extract - delivers a boost of antioxidantsFormulated WithoutAll e.l.f. products are free from phthalates, parabens, nonylphenol ethoxylates, triclosan, triclocarban, and hydroquinoneAll skincare is also free from sulfatesItem 2500313How To UseUse morning and night after cleansing. With your ring finger, gently dab around the under eye, outward to the temples, and along the brow bone to illuminate tired eyes.How to Use e.l.f. Full Skincare Regimen:Step 1: Serum: Apply first to clean skin to soothe redness and irritation while illuminating the skin.Step 2: Daily Hydration Moisturizer: After Soothing Serum, apply before makeup to moisturize and lock in hydration for smooth, even skin.Step 3: Illuminating Eye Cream: After moisturizing, gently dab around the eye and brow area to brighten and lift tired eyes.Step 4: Nourishing Night Cream: Apply to clean face before bed after Soothing Serum and wake up with vibrant skin!IngredientsWater (Aqua), Butylene Glycol, Dimethicone, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Glycerin, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Carbomer, Trehalose, Triethanolamine, Bisabolol, Tocopheryl Acetate (Ve), Disodium EDTA, Green Tea Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin.
how_to_use: Use morning and night after cleansing. With your ring finger, gently dab around the under eye, outward to the temples, and along the brow bone to illuminate tired eyes.How to Use e.l.f. Full Skincare Regimen:Step 1: Serum: Apply first to clean skin to soothe redness and irritation while illuminating the skin.Step 2: Daily Hydration Moisturizer: After Soothing Serum, apply before makeup to moisturize and lock in hydration for smooth, even skin.Step 3: Illuminating Eye Cream: After moisturizing, gently dab around the eye and brow area to brighten and lift tired eyes.Step 4: Nourishing Night Cream: Apply to clean face before bed after Soothing Serum and wake up with vibrant skin!

reviews.headline: I have bought this eye cream twice
reviews.comments: I bought this eye cream to help the puffiness under my eyes. I have not seen a lot of improvement there; however, my drooping eyelids are much better now. Over the weeks of using this eye cream I have definitely noticed that my eyelids are more open.

reviews.headline: Ouch
reviews.comments: I really wanted to love this. I use the holy hydration face moisturizer with no problem. This eye cream though, it burns the heck out of my eyes. Not the skin but my actual eyeballs which is strange because it does not really have a strong scent. It is a nice, light cream that absorbs well and has a pretty glimmer to it. I feel like my under eyes look brighter and moisturized but the amount of burning it causes my eyeballs is terrible. ðŸ˜­

reviews.headline: Irritating and not that moisturizing
reviews.comments: This eye cream irritated my eyes, which can be sensitive to most eye creams.  It is thick and doesn't absorb very well.  Also, despite the thickness, it did not moisturize that well.

reviews.headline: Great eye cream
reviews.comments: It really helps brighten and moisturize my undereyes but it does take a while to absorb

reviews.headline: Love Everything e.l.f.!
reviews.comments: I love e.l.f. products and this eye cream is no different. It's reasonably priced, so light and so hydrating.

reviews.headline: NOPE.
reviews.comments: this is a miss for me. Made my thirsty under eyes DRY. Didnt do anything. There are waaayyy better eye creams out there.

reviews.headline: it's so hydrating!
reviews.comments: I have very dry skin around my eyes and my skin is very sensitive. This is so hydrating without irritanting my skin and it sits well under makeup.

reviews.headline: Very Moisturizing
reviews.comments: Perfect eye cream for the price!

reviews.headline: Great for sensitive skin!
reviews.comments: As someone who suffers from sensitive dry skin, especially around my eyes, this product works wonders. Its the only affordable eye cream Ive found that truly works for me. I get dry flaked skin around my eyes whenever I try an eye cream that is too powerful but this is great. Depuffs, soothing, and very hydrating! If other eye creams have irritated your skin, this one is probably a great option for you!

reviews.headline: Many uses+ luv it
reviews.comments: This does worl just fine as an eye cream especially for the price, it works great! But in addition to an eye creme, for some unknown reason, it works GREAT FOR ACNE! Like it crossed my mind 1 day to try it on my acne and overnight, become much less noticeable, made the skin more even, shrunk pimples, and reduced redness.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: I've been using this for a few weeks and have noticed a difference. I would say I see less puffiness and diminished fine lines. Putting it on at night has been key.

reviews.headline: Great value and feels great!
reviews.comments: The holy hydration line has yet to disappoint.  I use this liberally without worrying about cost like some of the fancier eye creams.  It goes great with the holy hydration makeup remover,  which melts the mascara away.

reviews.headline: Good base for concealer
reviews.comments: It's a good everyday base for concealer that helps prevent too much creasing if you have fine lines. It's hydrating. It's not a miracle cure for super dark circles or puffy eyes. My biggest complaint was the product wasn't fully to the too of tge container. There was a huge crater in it which means I got much less product than whe I've previouly bought this.

reviews.headline: I will buy this product again
reviews.comments: I love this eye cream for the price and the quality. I will continue to use it.

reviews.headline: Don't buy.
reviews.comments: I was really exited to try this, but when i did it irritated my skin and didnt do anything. Dont waste ur money.

reviews.headline: It's Great!
reviews.comments:
I have pretty dark undereyes and I needed something to help. I like e.l.f products so I decided to try it and it works! I can definitely see a difference and my undereyes are lighter and my makeup is going on smoother. Its very hydrating. You don't have to use a lot so the product will last longer. There is no scent which is nice as well. 

It may not work for everyone but if you are looking for a product like this, give it a try!

reviews.headline: Not sure I would buy again
reviews.comments: I bought this in hopes that it would help to brighten up my crazy dark circles but I don't feel like I've seen any progress at all and its been a month. It doesn't burn and does do a good job hydrating but it hasn't solved (or helped) my dark cricles

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments:
Good moisturizer for under and around the eyes, does
not burn my eyesâ€¦

reviews.headline: Under make up
reviews.comments: This is an ok eye cream.  Not my favorite.  I will use it on my no make up days.  Makes my under eye concealer look dry and cakey. I have others that perform better.

reviews.headline: I really like this
reviews.comments: It's my 3rd time purchasing this product. I like the weight, feel & results of the product. And all at a really great price to boot!

media.headline: Beware
media.caption: My outer corner is red and scaly now

media.headline: Refreshing, Smoothing and Wonderful Eye Cream!!
media.caption: Fresh and light

faceoff_positive.comments:
I am a big fan of eye cream and this one is my favorite for several reasons:

1. It is very light.  You only need a small amount to moisturize and it lasts a long time.

2.  Price.  It is one of the best eye creams for the price point.  

3. You can wear your eye make up over it with no problem. Even if you are in a rush give it about 20 -30 sec it dries and you can your eye shadow and eyeliner goes on smoothly.

4. No scent.  If you are sensitive to scents this is perfect for you.

5.  Goes on smoothly.  It is not thick or clumpy goes on smoothly.

6.  Does not burn if it gets in your eyes.  I work out a lot and I have never had this eye cream burn my eyes like some.  

7.  Moisturizing.  It is moisturizing without being oily or greasy.  It settles in the skin very nicely.
faceoff_positive.headline: GREAT MOISTURIZER

faceoff_negative.comments: I have had the same reaction as a lot of other reviewers. I bought this eye cream because it was one of the cheaper options and I've loved elf products in the past. I used it for a couple of weeks and all was great. suddenly my undereye got very dry and every Concealer I was using and every makeup remover felt like it was irritating it. after buying 3 other makeup removers to try and 3 other concealers over the past two weeks I was examining my daily routine to try to find out was exactly was causing it. I came to the realization that the eye cream was my newest product. I have now stopped using it and will have to work on repairing the damage that was done. I'm only 21 and the dryness under my eye has made me feel like I look much older. I am not happy with this product. I've never been known to have sensitive skin, but I might.
faceoff_negative.headline: Made my undereye super dry
